title: Finding Refuge in El Paso: The 1912 Mormon Exodus from Mexico
description: Over sixty years after leaving Nauvoo, the Mormons were once again forced to flee for their lives. Discover this incredible story for the first time in this one-of-a-kind book and DVD set, detailing the events of the Mormon Exodus from Mexico in July 1912. Includes mesmerizing interviews from Richard Turley Jr., Lucille Romney, Henry B. Erying, and others.
author: Fred E. Woods
